item.title: Portfolio Stress Testing: A Multifactor Approach
E.T.F.: ETF Trend Following
item.description: Personal Project ———— Most trend following hedge funds are known as managed futures funds, or CTAs. These funds leverage the abundance of contracts in futures markets to create diversified portfolios aiming to capture the autocorrelation of returns within assets. Link towards Github repository Key takeaways It is possible to create a long-only trend following system with ETFs Long-only strategies may still allow market-neutrality Embedding a long volatility overlay significantly hedged tail risk Universe We use a sample of 137 ETFs split into 6 asset classes: equities, bonds, commodities, FX, real estate and volatility.
